content.formatted_body:
In reply to @shuyuguo:matrix.org
i meant May 6 9:00 - 10:00 PT, 1 hour later
No worries; I can make that too. Thanks for arranging!

content.body: `Array(Math.pow(2, 32) - 1).concat(1)` throws a RangeError about "too large" in node; in Safari it throws an OOM RangeError; in FF it seems to just hang. the spec seems to say it should throw a TypeError (https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-array.prototype.concat step 5.b.iii). am i reading it right? if so i can make a test262 test for it.
content.formatted_body: Array(Math.pow(2, 32) - 1).concat(1) throws a RangeError about "too large" in node; in Safari it throws an OOM RangeError; in FF it seems to just hang. the spec seems to say it should throw a TypeError (https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-array.prototype.concat step 5.b.iii). am i reading it right? if so i can make a test262 test for it.
